name: Distributed Network Capabilities
desc: Develops a framework for large-scale implementation of distributed network computing.

name: Improved Composites
desc: Develops new compositing techniques for stronger metal alloys.

name: Improved Disaster Response
desc: Develops new fabrication techniques.

name: Flexible Fabrication
desc: Develops new fabrication techniques.

name: Improved Cathodes
desc: Increased battery capacity through cathode manipulation.

name: Basic Geoengineering
desc: Projects designed to tackle the effects of climate change directly, usually by removing CO2 from the air or limiting the amount of sunlight reaching the planet's surface.

name: Improved Composites
desc: Developments new composite materials for future construction.

name: AI Foundations
desc: Basic Artificial Intelligence functionality and machine learning.

name: Distributed Network Capabilities
desc: Framework for large-scale implementation of faster than fiber connections.

name: Improved Recycling
desc: Improves national recycling capacity.

name: Improved Power Grid
desc: Improves your national power grid infrastructure.

name: Lightwave Restructuring
desc: Restructuring of light waves and photons to reduce amplitude and effect of global warming.

name: Advanced Geoengineering
desc: Advanced techniques of geoneering, like seeding stratocumulus clouds, installing sun-shields or mirrors in space to reflect the sun, or injecting sun-blocking particulates into space.

name: Nanoscaling
desc: Shrinking matter of inanimate objects down to near nano levels. Limitations occur based on object's density and inherent resistances.

name: Holographic Projection
desc: Physical emittance of an interference pattern which uses diffraction to reproduce a three-dimensional light field.

name: Material Deconstruction
desc: The break down of wastes into their constituent materials for re-use.

name: Advanced Power Distribution
desc: Improves and shields the national power grid infrastructure.

name: Minor Weather Alterations
desc: Allows raising or lowering of temperature by a few degrees or wind by a few MPH over a small area.

name: Nanorobotics
desc: Technology of creating machines or robots at or close to the scale of a nanometer.

name: Advanced AI
desc: Advanced Artificial Intelligence at a larger scale. Computers will think and optimize its own components as necessary.

name: Angular Momentum Optics
desc: Photon twisting in wireless medium - allows lossless wirefree communication.

name: Smart Systems
desc: Deploys integrated smart systems.

name: Red Mercury Mining
desc: Develops Red Mercury mining capability.

name: Fusion Reactor Prototyping
desc: Develops viable fusion reactor technology for Fusion Power.

name: Compact Weather Systems
desc: Weather changes over a small area not usually lasting very long. Allows rain to fall in areas of drought and sunshine in areas where needed. Severe changes to weather not possible.

name: Advanced Neural Networks
desc: Basic supercomputing with machine optimization. Used on a large network scale, mimicking the human brain.

name: Advanced Projection Systems
desc: Pinnacle systems of light emitting technology, allowing realistic viewpoints and interaction with individuals.

name: Plasmatic Mining
desc: Develops Plasma mining capability.

name: Arcology
desc: Megastructures for densely populated, ecologically low-impact human habitats, reducing human impact on natural resources.

name: Stratospheric Architecture
desc: Buildings or structures built to climb into the stratosphere.

name: FTL Communication
desc: Faster Than Light communication for deep space interaction.

name: Sentient Supercomputing
desc: Develops and deploys a fully sentient distributed AI network.

name: Inanimate Quantum Teleportation
desc: A process in which quantum information (e.g. the exact state of an atom or photon) can be transmitted (exactly, in principle) from one location to another.
